I was nervous about straying from Gopal (which I am familiar with and love) in order to try out another restaurant that may disappoint me.  Fortunately, I really liked my dinner at Veggie Garden. I read the daily menu was a bargain, but I was still surprised by just how much food I got for the price.  Everything we had was good, with the exception of dessert.  I liked my cake, but the chocolate mousse was just... weird.  It tasted fruity and not at all like chocolate. I would still definitely go back for the good value, satisfying food, and friendly service.
